text: The following separator characters are valid in the APL language. Separator Description Example Separator Description Example ( ) Used to enclose logical expressions and to overrule standard precedence NumFld = (NumFld2 + 2) * 3; { } Used to enclose blocks if ( ACode == "ABC" ) { // do_this // and_this } . Separates fields in UDR value accesses input.myField = 5;
title: Separators - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
